model_input:

You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:

Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Husband: I hung up some more lights and candles today.

[MEMORY]

She values close relationships and believes that it's the little things that make life meaningful. Wife is glad that Husband has trustworthy friends and believes in the importance of having interests and hobbies outside of work and family life. 

Relationship Description: Wife is supportive and happy for Husband, showing a level of intimacy in their relationship. She values Husband's faith journey and enjoys seeing him passionate about his beliefs. 

Event Description: Husband had a great time hanging out with his friend and catching up on ideas for a new project. He is looking forward to working on the project and believes in the importance of having interests outside of work. Wife is glad that Husband had a good time and appreciates having someone trustworthy in his life. Husband also made it on time to catch the bus, which gave him an adrenaline rush and made him feel lucky. Wife remembers Husband being baptized and is supportive of his involvement in church ministries. Both Husband and Wife cherish their relationship and the connections they have in life.
